chat_history.message: Hello, My iPhone 13 has the above problem: I have a VAT ID number and forgot to mention it, so I don't need to pay the 20% value-added tax, since the item is for my company, my ID number is DE265 713 692 Thank you very much for your help,

Dear ecomobile,

The customer would like the VAT identification number to be included in the invoice.

VAT ID number is: DE265 713 692

This is the billing address:

Bärbel Teufel-Zawisza
Lohn-u.Finanzbuchhaltung
Altenbergweg 20
97999 Igersheim
Deutschland

Please send us the newly issued invoice.

Thank you very much for your efforts.

Dear Backcare,

I have attached the updated invoice in this message. Do let me know if the customer still requires any assistance. Thank you.

CH

Hello,
My iPhone 13 has the above problem:
The phone often hangs up, and you're kicked out of different apps randomly, the battery is depleted very quickly despite being at 100% capacity, the phone often doesn't respond.

Thank you for your help,

If sellers: receive a package, they have 3 working days (5 working days for laptops and household appliances) to repair or replace the product. To initiate a refund if applicable, they have 2 working days.
The customer or customer has met the following requirements for a successful return:
✔ They confirm that the device has not been opened by a third party nor damaged (through drop or water exposure).
✔ They confirm that all personal data has been removed from the device.
✔ Confirmed that the return label has arrived.
✔ Knows that the entire accessories and purchase receipt must be attached to the package.
✔ Knows that the return label is valid for 14 days.

Don't forget: As soon as the package arrives, sellers have 3 working days (5 working days for laptops and household appliances) to repair or replace the product, respectively, or 2 working days to refund the amount.

Hello, 
My product iPhone 13 has the above problem:
I sent my phone back for exchange on May 30, 2024 and I still haven't received a shipment confirmation yet. Although it was stated on the website that the phone will be delivered within 5 to 7 working days.
Thank you very much for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

You have received the product for exchange the 04/06/2024. The delay to repair or exchange the product is 3 days for technical issue. 

The customer had the following problems with the device: It frequently hangs, you are kicked out of various applications, the battery drains very quickly despite 100 percent capacity and the device often no longer responds at all.

Customer is waiting for information from you.

Kind regards
Derya from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.

Regards,
KW
